com.escape.games.model
Class Geometry

java.lang.Object
  com.escape.games.model.Geometry
All Implemented Interfaces:
RequireResourceLoader
Direct Known Subclasses:
AxisGeometry, IndexedVertexGeometry, InterleavedVBOGeometry, InterleavedVertexGeometry, OBJModelGeometry
public abstract class Geometry
extends java.lang.Object
implements RequireResourceLoader

Core implementation for geometry data and its rendering. Delegates RequireResourceLoader.

Author:
escape-llc

colorVertices

public static java.nio.FloatBuffer colorVertices(int numv,
                                                 Geometry.Vec4[] colors)
Create a vertex color buffer. One vertex is made from each color in the list, looping around the list.

Parameters:
numv - Number of vertices.
colors - Color source array.
Returns:
New buffer.
